original_text: Other seeds fell among thorn bushes. Those bushes grew up with the young plants. They stopped the seeds from growing into strong plants. So the plants could not make any new seeds.
korean_text: 더러는 가시떨기에 떨어지매 가시가 자라 기운을 막으므로 결실하지 못하였고

sentences.original_text: Other seeds fell among thorn bushes
sentences.korean_translation: 다른 씨앗들은 가시 덤불 사이에 떨어졌다

sentences.original_text: Those bushes grew up with the young plants
sentences.korean_translation: 그 덤불들은 어린 식물들과 함께 자라났다

sentences.original_text: They stopped the seeds from growing into strong plants
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 씨앗들이 튼튼한 식물로 자라는 것을 막았다

sentences.original_text: So the plants could not make any new seeds
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 식물들은 새로운 씨앗을 만들 수 없었다
